Plot: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.
Title: Eyes Wide Shut
Writer: Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Frederic Raphael (screenplay), Arthur Schnitzler (inspired by the novel by)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack, Marie Richardson
tomatoConsensus: Kubrick's intense study of the human psyche yields an impressive cinematic work.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 7 wins & 24 nominations.
